data.name: Defiance - Gold Edition
data.detailed_description:
Unlock the complete Defiance experience! This awesome edition rolls all 5 of Defiance’s DLCs (plus other incredible bonuses) into a single, convenient package. It’s never been easier to start your life as an Ark Hunter!

INCLUDES:

Steam exclusive TMW Hannibal 800R Slate/Navy Blue Vehicle

A vehicle to get around in style!

+35 Inventory Slots

Carry more weapons!

+3 Loadout Slots

Customize your ark hunter further!

+25 Ark Key Expansion

Earn more loot in-game!

DLC 1: Castithan Charge Pack

Play as a Castithan and use charged weapons. Further customize your Ark Hunter with new appearance options, complete new Story Mission Lines, and get access to new Pursuits.

DLC 2: Arkbreaker Pack

Explore and fight your way through arks YOU bring to Earth and battle your way through new mission lines with Volge Weaponry.

DLC 3: 7th Legion Pack

Join the elite forces of Yoshida Hiro and become part of the 7th Legion. Fight to liberate Paradise with new weapons, armor, and more.

DLC 4: Gunslinger Trials Pack

Answer Von Bach Industries' call to arms and battle through new Co-op Arenas and story missions to reap rewards from the most powerful weapons manufacturer on Earth.

DLC 5: Arktech Revolution Pack

Plunge into new advanced and expert events and co-op maps. Hunt deadly new enemies with legendary weapons and mods from Chimera, a rising force in the underground arms trade.

data.short_description: Unlock the complete Defiance experience! This awesome edition rolls all 5 of Defiance’s DLCs (plus other incredible bonuses) into a single, convenient package. It’s never been easier to start your life as an Ark Hunter!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2 GB System RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB video card (NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI Radeon HD 2900, or Intel HD 4000 integrated graphics or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 15 GB free hard drive space
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compatible sound card
  • Internet: Broadband internet connection
